footer_about_site_text: CozyGame is a free online gaming platform offering a variety of fun games for you to enjoy anytime, anywhere.

about_page_description: Learn about CozyGame's story, mission, and what we offer.
about_mission_text: At CozyGame, we're dedicated to creating a relaxed and friendly gaming community for players worldwide, making quality online games accessible to everyone, whether at home or on the go.
about_offer_text: CozyGame is a curated gaming platform offering a wide variety of free online games. Our features include:
about_feature_1: Handpicked quality games across various genres and styles
about_feature_2: VIP game section with unique gaming experiences, free for all users
about_feature_3: Personalized favorites and game history to keep track of your beloved games
about_feature_4: Cross-device compatibility so you can play on any device
about_team_text: CozyGame is made up of a group of passionate gamers and developers dedicated to creating the best online gaming experience. We're constantly looking for new ways to improve our platform and offer more fun games and features to our users.
about_team_quote: We're passionate about creating joyful gaming experiences for everyone!
contact_page_description: Questions or suggestions? Get in touch with the CozyGame team through our contact form.
contact_response_time_text: We typically respond to emails within 24-48 hours.
contact_form_success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact_subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you! Fill out the form below or contact us via email.
privacy_page_description: Learn how CozyGame collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy_introduction_text: This Privacy Policy describes how CozyGame ("we", "our", or "the Website") collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from users ("you") of our website.
privacy_information_collection_text: We may collect several types of information, including but not limited to the following:
privacy_personal_information_text: When you log in with Google or contact us, we may collect the following personal information:
privacy_info_account: Account information (such as your Google account details)
privacy_automatic_information_text: We may automatically collect certain information, including:
privacy_info_device: Device information (such as device type, operating system, and browser type)
privacy_info_usage: Usage data (such as access time, pages viewed, and interactions)
privacy_info_cookies: Information collected through cookies and similar technologies
privacy_information_use_text: We may use the collected information for the following purposes:
privacy_use_provide_services: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy_use_improve_services: To personalize your experience and deliver content you might be interested in
privacy_use_communication: To communicate with you and respond to your inquiries
privacy_use_analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve the website
privacy_information_sharing_text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except in the following cases:
privacy_sharing_service_providers: With trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website or services
privacy_sharing_legal: When we believe it is necessary to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect our or others' rights, property, or safety
privacy_security_text: We implement appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information.
privacy_user_rights_text: Under applicable data protection laws, you may have the following rights:
privacy_rights_access: Access to the personal information we hold about you
privacy_rights_erasure: Deletion of your data in certain circumstances
privacy_rights_restriction: Restriction of processing in certain circumstances
privacy_children_text: Our services are not directed to individuals under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy_changes_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page and encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
disclaimer_page_description: Understand the legal disclaimers for using CozyGame website and services.
disclaimer_introduction_text: The information and services provided by CozyGame are for general informational and entertainment purposes only. While we strive to keep the information up to date and correct, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the website.
disclaimer_interpretation_text: By using this website, you agree to the terms and conditions of this disclaimer. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use this website.
disclaimer_external_links_text: This website may contain links to other websites or third-party game content embedded via iframes. These links and content are provided for your convenience only. We have no control over the content and privacy practices of these sites.
disclaimer_game_content_text: The games offered on our platform come from various third-party sources. We are not responsible for the content, quality, or availability of these games. The views and opinions expressed in the games do not necessarily reflect those of CozyGame.
disclaimer_errors_inaccuracies_text: While we strive to avoid errors and inaccuracies on our website, we do not warrant that the content is error-free or complete. We reserve the right to change the content of the website at any time without notice.
disclaimer_fair_use_text: Some of the content on this website may be based on the fair use principle of third-party content. We respect the intellectual property rights of copyright holders and will remove any infringing content upon request by the copyright holder.
disclaimer_views_expressed_text: The views expressed on this website are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of CozyGame.
disclaimer_no_responsibility_text: In no event shall CozyGame be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, arising out of, or in connection with, the use of or inability to use this website or its content.
disclaimer_contact_text: If you have any questions about this disclaimer, please contact us at:
terms_page_description: Understand the terms and conditions for using CozyGame website and services.
terms_introduction_text: Welcome to CozyGame! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use this website if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
terms_def_service_text: Refers to the website and services provided by CozyGame.
terms_def_content_text: Refers to all information that appears on our Services, including but not limited to text, images, audio, video, software, games, and interactive features.
terms_def_customer_text: Refers to any person who accesses or uses the Services.
terms_def_third_party_text: Refers to any party that is not you or CozyGame.
terms_def_website_text: Refers to the website operated by CozyGame, accessible at cozygame.fun.
terms_acknowledgment_text: These are the terms and conditions between you and CozyGame governing your use of this website. By accessing this website and/or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms_user_accounts_text: When you create an account through a third-party service like Google, you may be required to provide certain information. You must ensure that all information you provide is accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
terms_user_accounts_responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. We encourage the use of strong passwords and their regular change.
terms_intellectual_property_text: This website and its original content, features, and functionality are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
terms_intellectual_property_third_party: Third-party games and content on our website may be protected by the copyright and other intellectual property rights of their respective owners. We respect these rights and expect users to do the same.
terms_user_generated_content_text: If we allow users to post, submit, or upload content on our website, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, copy, distribute, and display such content.
terms_user_generated_content_responsibil: You are fully responsible for any content you submit, post, or display on the website. You warrant that you own or have obtained all the rights to use and authorize us to use all content you provide.
terms_prohibited_illegal: Use the Services in any manner that is illegal or violates any local, state, national, or international law or regulation
terms_prohibited_violate: Violate any provision of these Terms
terms_prohibited_infringe: Infringe upon the intellectual property rights of any third party
terms_prohibited_harm: Interfere with or disrupt the Services or servers or networks connected to the Services
terms_prohibited_impersonate: Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity
terms_prohibited_interfere: Interfere with another user's use of the Services
terms_termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time, without prior notice, for any reason whatsoever, including, without limitation, if you breach these Terms.
terms_limitation_liability_text: In no event shall CozyGame, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, or other damages arising from your use of or inability to use the Services.
terms_governing_law_text: These Terms shall be governed by the laws, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms_changes_text: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will try to provide notice of any material changes. Your continued use of or access to our Services following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
terms_contact_text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

cookie_policy_page_description: Learn about how CozyGame.fun uses cookies and similar technologies.
cookie_introduction_text: This Cookie Policy explains how CozyGame.fun ('we', 'us', or 'our') uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.
cookie_introduction_text_2: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners in order to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.
cookie_types_text: We use the following types of cookies:
cookie_essential_text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.
cookie_functionality_text: These cookies allow us to remember choices you make when you use our website, such as remembering your language preferences or your login details. The purpose of these cookies is to provide you with a more personal experience and to avoid you having to re-enter your preferences every time you visit our website.
cookie_analytics_text: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.
cookie_control_text: You can set or amend your web browser controls to accept or refuse cookies. If you choose to reject cookies, you may still use our website though your access to some functionality and areas of our website may be restricted.
cookie_control_text_2: The specific way to refuse cookies through your web browser controls varies from browser to browser. Please visit your browser's help menu for more information.
cookie_updates_text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time in order to reflect changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please therefore revisit this Cookie Policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies and related technologies.
cookie_updates_text_2: The date at the top of this Cookie Policy indicates when it was last updated.
cookie_contact_text: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:
